Void Breaker

Platforms:
Windows
In Development Released December 1, 2025

A sci-fi action game where you pilot advanced mechs through dimensional rifts. Fast-paced combat meets strategic mech customization.

Play on Itch.io

Screenshots

About Void Breaker

Void Breaker thrusts players into an epic sci-fi conflict where reality itself is under threat. As an elite mech pilot, you'll traverse dimensional rifts to combat an otherworldly invasion. The game combines intense real-time combat with deep mech customization, allowing players to adapt their machines for different mission types and enemy encounters. Each dimensional rift presents unique challenges and environmental hazards.

Key Features

  • Extensive mech customization system
  • Fast-paced 3D combat mechanics
  • Multiple dimensional environments
  • Strategic weapon and equipment choices
  • Boss battles against massive void entities
  • Progression system with unlockable parts

System Requirements

Minimum

OS
Windows 10
Processor
Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
Memory
8 GB RAM
Graphics
NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
Storage
15 GB available space

Recommended

OS
Windows 11
Processor
Intel Core i7-10700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
Memory
16 GB RAM
Graphics
NVIDIA RTX 3070 / AMD RX 6700 XT
Storage
20 GB available space (SSD recommended)
